overview_of_class: The course introduces teaching and learning strategies that aid course participants in becoming effective educators in the secondary school setting. Emphasizing current research, the course is a comprehensive study of teaching methods in English. Lesson and unit planning and assessment of student learning are elements of the seminar.
name: Methods & Techniques: English
title: SESP TEACH_ED 356-0-20 Methods & Techniques: English

descriptions.name: Overview of class
descriptions.value: The course introduces teaching and learning strategies that aid course participants in becoming effective educators in the secondary school setting. Emphasizing current research, the course is a comprehensive study of teaching methods in English. Lesson and unit planning and assessment of student learning are elements of the seminar.
